hpCard1.title: Brand Level
hpCard1.subTitle: A Trustworthy Brand
hpCard1.description: With over 80 years of experience in precious metal jewellery, we uphold the strictest standards to each Chow Sang Sang 999.9 gold bar.

hpCard2.title: Quality Control
hpCard2.subTitle: Our Precious Metal Laboratories
hpCard2.description: Supported by specialized knowledge and state-of-the-art instruments, our well trained professional chemists endeavor to develop innovative testing techniques to ensure the fineness and safety of Chow Sang Sang 999.9 gold bar delivered to our customers.

hpCard3.title: After Sales Service
hpCard3.subTitle: Comprehensive Professional Care
hpCard3.description: We offer lifelong free cleaning service for every Chow Sang Sang 999.9 gold bar to keep it ever shining and extend its longevity.
